flawed_nl_solution:
Since one-foot wire mesh is sold at $30, with $120000, Melany can buy $120000/$30 = <<120000/30=400>>400 feet of wire mesh.
If Melany has to fence 5000 feet of the field and has 400 feet of wire mesh, she will not fence 5000-400 = <<5000-400=4600>>4600 feet of the field.
#### 4600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4000, not 400. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
